doc.title: Undercover Lovers
doc.plot: Narinder Kaur from Big Brother 2 presents this reality format show. Each week 5 couples stay in a luxurious country estate, but no-one knows who the couples are. The couple who can keep their relationship hidden till the end of the week wins Â£5000. Think it sounds easy? One of the couples are actors and they are in the house to stir things up.
